histogram.name: NCN.ConnectionTypeChangeToIPAddressChange
histogram.summary: Time from ConnectionTypeChanged message until IPAddressChanged message.

histogram.name: NCN.DNSConfigChange
histogram.summary: Time between DNS configuration change messages.

histogram.name: NCN.GetActiveNetworkInfoResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of querying the network info of the current active network. Useful for investigating how frequently the current network was unblocked, and why it was not unblocked. See http://crbug.com/677365.

histogram.name: NCN.GetConnectionTypeTime
histogram.summary: How long does each call to NetworkChangeNotifier::GetConnectionType() take.

histogram.name: NCN.getNetInfo1stSuccess
histogram.summary: True if the first call to ConnectivityManager.getNetworkInfo(Network) did not throw NullPointerException, false if it did. Useful for investigating and avoiding unexpected exceptions, see http://crbug.com/592131.

histogram.name: NCN.getNetInfo2ndSuccess
histogram.summary: Recorded after the first call to ConnectivityManager.getNetworkInfo(Network) threw a NullPointerException. True if the second call to ConnectivityManager.getNetworkInfo(Network) did not throw NullPointerException, false if it did. Useful for investigating and avoiding unexpected exceptions, see http://crbug.com/592131.

histogram.name: NCN.getWifiInfo1stSuccess
histogram.summary: True if the first call to WifiManager.getConnectionInfo() did not throw NullPointerException, false if it did. Useful for investigating and avoiding unexpected exceptions, see http://crbug.com/592131.

histogram.name: NCN.getWifiInfo2ndSuccess
histogram.summary: Recorded after the first call to WifiManager.getConnectionInfo() threw a NullPointerException. True if the second call to ConnectivityManager.getNetworkInfo(Network) did not throw NullPointerException, false if it did. Useful for investigating and avoiding unexpected exceptions, see http://crbug.com/592131.

histogram.name: NCN.IPAddressChange
histogram.summary: Time between IP address change messages.

histogram.name: NCN.IPAddressChangeToConnectionTypeChange
histogram.summary: Time from IPAddressChanged message until ConnectionTypeChanged message.

histogram.name: NCN.NetworkOfflineChange
histogram.summary: Time between going online until we go offline change messages, using new filtered signal.

histogram.name: NCN.NetworkOnlineChange
histogram.summary: Time between going offline until we go online change messages, using new filtered signal.

histogram.name: NCN.OfflineChange
histogram.summary: Time between going online until we go offline change messages.

histogram.name: NCN.OfflineDataRecv
histogram.summary: Time between when we thought we went offline and when we received some network data (a URLRequest read completed).

histogram.name: NCN.OfflineDataRecvAny5sBeforeOnline
histogram.summary: Count of how many times we received network data (a URLRequest read completed) while offline when some data was received at most five seconds before going online.

histogram.name: NCN.OfflineDataRecvUntilOnline
histogram.summary: Time between when we received the last network data (a URLRequest read completed) while offline and when we thought we went online.

histogram.name: NCN.OfflinePolls
histogram.summary: Count of how many times we polled the online/offline status before detecting an offline to online transition.

histogram.name: NCN.OnlineChange
histogram.summary: Time between going offline until we go online change messages.

histogram.name: NCN.PollingOfflineDataRecv
histogram.summary: Time between when we thought we went offline and when we received some network data (a URLRequest read completed), while polling NetworkChangeNotifier::GetConnectionType() still told us we were offline.

histogram.name: Net.AlternateProtocolUsage.1000Truncated
histogram.summary: Breakdown of how requests which could potentially make use of an alternate protocol use or don't use the protocol. Loaded data for 1000 servers and we have persisted 1000 MRU servers.

histogram.name: Net.AlternateProtocolUsage.200Truncated
histogram.summary: Breakdown of how requests which could potentially make use of an alternate protocol use or don't use the protocol. Loaded data for 200 servers and we have persisted 1000 MRU servers.

histogram.name: Net.AlternativeProxyFailed
histogram.summary:
Positive net error codes that failed alternative proxy requests end with. Recorded when an alternative job fails, whether or not the main job succeeds.
As of M66 this superceded DataReductionProxy.Quic.OnAlternativeProxyBroken.

histogram.name: Net.AlternativeServiceServers.MoreOrEqualCacheEntries
histogram.summary: The difference between the size of alternative service mappings in cache and preferences. This tracks zero or negative values (when the difference between preferences size is less than or equal to memory cache size). Positive values are tracked by Net.AlternativeServiceServers.MorePrefsEntries.

histogram.name: Net.AlternativeServiceServers.MorePrefsEntries
histogram.summary: The difference between the size of alternative service mappings in preferences and cache. This tracks positive values (when the difference between preferences size is greater than memory cache size). Non positive values are tracked by Net.AlternativeServiceServers.MoreOrEqualCacheEntries.

histogram.name: Net.AsyncResourceHandler_PendingDataCount
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The count of unacknowledged ResourceMsg_DataReceived messages. This message is sent once per chunk of data read from the network.

histogram.name: Net.AsyncResourceHandler_PendingDataCount_WhenFull
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The count of unacknowledged ResourceMsg_DataReceived messages at the point where we pause network loading.

histogram.name: Net.AsyncResourceHandler_RedirectHopTime
histogram.summary: The time between the call of AsyncResourceHandler::OnRequestRedirected and the FollowRedirect IPC message from ResourceHost, that is, the length of the redirect browser-renderer-browser hop.

histogram.name: Net.AsyncResourceHandler_SharedIOBuffer_Alloc
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The size of a SharedIOBuffer allocation.

histogram.name: Net.AsyncResourceHandler_SharedIOBuffer_Used
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of bytes copied into a SharedIOBuffer.

histogram.name: Net.AsyncResourceHandler_SharedIOBuffer_UsedPercentage
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The percentage of a SharedIOBuffer allocation that is actually used.

histogram.name: Net.AsyncRevalidation.ReadError
histogram.summary: Counts of error codes received while reading the body of an async revalidation before getting a response. Only async revalidations that had a read error are counted.

histogram.name: Net.AsyncRevalidation.ResponseError
histogram.summary: Counts of error codes received while performing an async revalidation before getting a response. Only async revalidations that had in a response error are counted.

histogram.name: Net.AsyncRevalidation.Result
histogram.summary: The result of an async revalidation resulting from application of the Cache-Control: stale-while-revalidate directive. All async revalidations are counted.

histogram.name: Net.AuthGenerateToken_basic
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time to generate a Basic HTTP authentication token.

histogram.name: Net.AuthGenerateToken_digest
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time to generate a Digest HTTP authentication token.

histogram.name: Net.AuthGenerateToken_negotiate
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time to generate a Negotiate (or SPNEGO) HTTP authentication token.

histogram.name: Net.AuthGenerateToken_ntlm
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time to generate an NTLM HTTP authentication token.

histogram.name: Net.AutoReload.CountAtStop
histogram.summary: Number of times auto-reload has been attempted before auto-reload stopped without succeeding, either because the stop button was pressed or because the renderer was destroyed.

histogram.name: Net.AutoReload.CountAtSuccess
histogram.summary: Number of times auto-reload had to attempt to reload a page before succeeding.

histogram.name: Net.AutoReload.ErrorAtFirstSuccess
histogram.summary: Original error code that started an auto-reload which then succeeded on the first attempt.

histogram.name: Net.AutoReload.ErrorAtStop
histogram.summary: Error code, if any, when auto-reload stopped without succeeding, either because the stop button was pressed or because the renderer was destroyed.

histogram.name: Net.AutoReload.ErrorAtSuccess
histogram.summary: Original error code that started an auto-reload which then eventually succeeded.

histogram.name: Net.BidirectionalStream.ReceivedBytes
histogram.obsolete: Removed 07/2020. Not used in active investigations.
histogram.summary: Number of bytes received over this stream.

histogram.name: Net.BidirectionalStream.SentBytes
histogram.obsolete: Removed 07/2020. Not used in active investigations.
histogram.summary: Number of bytes sent over this stream.

histogram.name: Net.BidirectionalStream.TimeToReadEnd
histogram.obsolete: Removed 07/2020. Not used in active investigations.
histogram.summary: How long it takes from starting the request to reading the end of the response.

histogram.name: Net.BidirectionalStream.TimeToReadStart
histogram.obsolete: Removed 07/2020. Not used in active investigations.
histogram.summary: How long it takes from starting the request to reading the start of the response.

histogram.name: Net.BidirectionalStream.TimeToSendEnd
histogram.obsolete: Removed 07/2020. Not used in active investigations.
histogram.summary: How long it takes from starting the request to when the last byte is sent.

histogram.name: Net.BidirectionalStream.TimeToSendStart
histogram.obsolete: Removed 07/2020. Not used in active investigations.
histogram.summary: How long it takes from starting the request to when we can start sending data.

histogram.name: Net.CacheState.AllBytes
histogram.summary: Counts of response bytes by cache state.

histogram.name: Net.CacheState.AllRequests
histogram.summary: State of the cache for a request, delta-encoding eligible or otherwise.

histogram.name: Net.CacheState.EncodeableBytes
histogram.summary: Counts of response bytes by cache state for delta-encoding eligible requests.

histogram.name: Net.CacheState.EncodeableRequests
histogram.summary: State of the cache for a delta-encoding eligible request.

histogram.name: Net.CertCommonNameFallback
histogram.summary:
Whether the certificate common name was used for matching the hostname, instead of the subjectAlternativeName.
Measures results for all CAs (internal and publicly-trusted).

histogram.name: Net.CertCommonNameFallbackPrivateCA
histogram.summary:
Whether the certificate common name was used for matching the hostname, instead of the subjectAlternativeName.
Measures results ony for internal (non-publicly-trusted) CAs.

histogram.name: Net.Certificate.ClientCertDialogCount.Android
histogram.obsolete: Removed 03/2020, since the client cert dialog capping logic has been in place for a year now without any problems.
histogram.summary:
As of 03/2019, abusive sites can create a nuisance for Android users by repeatedly displaying client certificate request dialogs. This histogram records how many client certificate request dialogs were displayed to the user. At first, we would like to get a handle on the number of request dialogs displayed by sites in the wild. Once we have sufficient data, we will impose some limits to prevent abuse without breaking legitimate sites.
This metric is emitted whenever a new main frame navigation commits and whenever a WebContents is destroyed.
https://crbug.com/817208

histogram.name: Net.Certificate.SHA1.MainFrame
histogram.obsolete: Removed 06/2017 as SHA-1 was successfully disabled in 01/2017.
histogram.summary: Whether or not SHA-1 was present in a resource fetched for the main frame, and if so, what its maximum validity period was.

histogram.name: Net.Certificate.SHA1.Subresource
histogram.obsolete: Removed 06/2017 as SHA-1 was successfully disabled in 01/2017.
histogram.summary: Whether or not SHA-1 was present in a subresource fetch, and if so, what its maximum validity period was.

histogram.name: Net.CertificatePinSuccess
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: A validated certificate chain may be subject to additional "pinning" requirements on a per-domain basis. This records the fraction of successful matches between a certificate chain and a pin list.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.CanInclusionCheckSCT
histogram.summary: Whether an observed Signed Certificate Timestamp (SCT) can be checked for inclusion. An SCT can be checked for inclusion if the client has a valid Signed Tree Head (STH) and the STH currently known to the client was issued 24 hours after the timestamp in the SCT (24 hours being the typical Maximum Merge Delay).

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.ConnectionComplianceStatus.QUIC
histogram.summary: The compliance of each QUIC connection with the Certificate Transparency policy, recorded once on connection setup unless CT evaluation has been disabled for that connection or the certificate is invalid. Connections can be compliant, or they can be non-compliant for one of several reasons (not enough Signed Certificate Timestamps [SCTs], not diverse enough SCTs, or the build was old so CT compliance wasn't checked).

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.ConnectionComplianceStatus.SSL
histogram.summary: The compliance of each SSL connection with the Certificate Transparency policy, recorded once on connection setup unless CT evaluation has been disabled for that connection or the certificate is invalid. Connections can be compliant, or they can be non-compliant for one of several reasons (not enough Signed Certificate Timestamps [SCTs], not diverse enough SCTs, or the build was old so CT compliance wasn't checked).

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.CTRequiredConnectionComplianceStatus
histogram.summary: The compliance of each QUIC connection with the Certificate Transparency policy, for connections for which CT compliance is required for the connection to succeed. (For example, CT compliance is required for certain Certificate Authorities, or a site can opt in to having CT be required.) Recorded once on connection setup for applicable connections unless CT evaluation has been disabled for that connection or the certificate is otherwise invalid.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.CTRequiredConnectionComplianceStatus.SSL
histogram.summary: The compliance of each SSL connection with the Certificate Transparency policy, for connections for which CT compliance is required for the connection to succeed. (For example, CT compliance is required for certain Certificate Authorities, or a site can opt in to having CT be required.) Recorded once on connection setup for applicable connections unless CT evaluation has been disabled for that connection or the certificate is otherwise invalid. Not recorded for certificates that chain to locally-installed roots.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.DnsQueryAuditProofError
histogram.summary: Counts of specific error codes returned by LogDnsClient at the end of an attempt to obtain an inclusion proof for a certificate from a Certificate Transparency log.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.DnsQueryAuditProofRcode
histogram.summary: Counts of specific DNS response codes returned by LogDnsClient at the end of an attempt to obtain an inclusion proof for a certificate from a Certificate Transparency log. The response codes (rcodes) and meanings are listed on https://www.iana.org/assignments/dns-parameters/dns-parameters.xhtml#dns-parameters-6.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.DnsQueryDuration
histogram.summary: The time taken attempting to obtain an inclusion proof from a Certificate Transparency log over DNS. This includes the time taken to obtain the leaf index first. Emitted at the end of an attempt. Includes attempts that fail.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.DnsQueryDuration.Success
histogram.summary: The time taken to successfully obtain an inclusion proof from a Certificate Transparency log over DNS. This includes the time taken to obtain the leaf index first. Emitted at the end of an attempt.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.DnsQueryLeafIndexError
histogram.summary: Counts of specific error codes returned by LogDnsClient at the end of an attempt to obtain a leaf index for a certificate from a Certificate Transparency log.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.DnsQueryLeafIndexRcode
histogram.summary: Counts of specific DNS response codes returned by LogDnsClient at the end of an attempt to obtain a leaf index for a certificate from a Certificate Transparency log. The response codes (rcodes) and meanings are listed on https://www.iana.org/assignments/dns-parameters/dns-parameters.xhtml#dns-parameters-6.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.DnsQueryStatus
histogram.obsolete: Replaced by Net.CertificateTransparency.DnsQueryError, which provides the full range of net::Error codes rather than summarising them into the limited set used by this histogram.
histogram.summary: The status of each attempt to obtain an inclusion proof from a Certificate Transparency log over DNS. This can consist of more than one DNS request. Emitted at the end of an attempt.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.EVCompliance.QUIC
histogram.summary: The state of compliance with Certificate Transparency presence requirements for each EV certificate. Recorded once on QUIC connection setup when the connection uses an EV certificate unless CT evaluation has been disabled for that connection or the certificate is invalid.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.EVCompliance.SSL
histogram.summary: The state of compliance with Certificate Transparency presence requirements for each EV certificate. Recorded once on SSL connection setup when the connection uses an EV certificate unless CT evaluation has been disabled for that connection or the certificate is invalid.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.InclusionCheckResult
histogram.summary: The result of an inclusion check for a Certificate Transparency log entry (composed of a TLS certificate observed together with Signed Certificate Timestamps). Emitted once per (TLS certificate, Signed Certificate Timestamp) pair observed and checked for inclusion (check results are cached).

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.MainFrameValidSCTCount
histogram.summary: Number of valid Signed Certificate Timestamps (SCTs) present for the main-frame resource. Emitted every time a main-frame resource is fetched.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.PilotSTHAge
histogram.summary: Age of Pilot's Signed Tree Head, as observed by the client, in minutes. Measuring the age of a particular log's Signed Tree Head will allow more informed update frequency of the Component Updater component that provides them. Emitted once for every STH update received by the component updater.

histogram.name: Net.CertificateTransparency.SCTsPerConnection
histogram.summary: The number of Signed Certificate Timestamps (SCTs) that were available for each SSL connection, including SCTs embedded in the certificate. This metric measures how many SSL connections had SCTs available. Emitted during every SSL connection establishment.

histogram.name: Net.CoalescePotential
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of times we sent N packets, but could have sent N-1 packets.

histogram.name: Net.ComodoDNSExperimentFailureTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The amount of time taken before we failed to resolve the Comodo test DNS record. This is an experiment, run in conjuction with Comodo, to test the viability of a DNS based certificate revocation mechanism.

histogram.name: Net.ComodoDNSExperimentSuccessTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The amount of time taken to successfully resolve the Comodo test DNS record. This is an experiment, run in conjuction with Comodo, to test the viability of a DNS based certificate revocation mechanism.

histogram.name: Net.Compress.NoProxy.BytesAfterCompression
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The uncompressed number of bytes received per request that was compressed. Only includes requests which did not go through an explicit proxy and did not go over SSL.

histogram.name: Net.Compress.NoProxy.BytesBeforeCompression
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The compressed number of bytes received per request that was compressed. Only includes requests which did not go through an explicit proxy and did not go over SSL.

histogram.name: Net.Compress.NoProxy.ShouldHaveBeenCompressed
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The uncompressed number of bytes received per request that was not compressed but appears to have been compressible. Only includes requests which did not go through an explicit proxy and did not go over SSL.

histogram.name: Net.Compress.Proxy.BytesAfterCompression
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The uncompressed number of bytes received per request that was compressed. Only includes requests sent through a proxy without SSL.

histogram.name: Net.Compress.Proxy.BytesBeforeCompression
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The compressed number of bytes received per request that was compressed. Only includes requests sent through a proxy without SSL.

histogram.name: Net.Compress.Proxy.ShouldHaveBeenCompressed
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The uncompressed number of bytes received per request that was not compressed but appears to have been compressible. Only includes requests sent through a proxy without SSL.

histogram.name: Net.Compress.SSL.BytesAfterCompression
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The uncompressed number of bytes received per request that was compressed. Only includes requests sent over SSL.

histogram.name: Net.Compress.SSL.BytesBeforeCompression
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The compressed number of bytes received per request that was compressed. Only includes requests sent over SSL.

histogram.name: Net.Compress.SSL.ShouldHaveBeenCompressed
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The uncompressed number of bytes received per request that was not compressed but appears to have been compressible. Only includes requests sent over SSL.

histogram.name: Net.ConnectionTypeCount
histogram.obsolete: The count was inaccurate (it counted transactions rather than connections)
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Each bucket is the number of connections of a particular type that the user has had during the session.

histogram.name: Net.ConnectionTypeCount2
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Each bucket is the number of successful connections of a particular type that the user has had during the session.

histogram.name: Net.ConnectionTypeCount3
histogram.summary: Each bucket is the number of successful connections of a particular type that the user has had during the session.

histogram.name: Net.ConnectionTypeFailCount2
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Each bucket is the number of failed connections of a particular type that the user has had during the session.

histogram.name: Net.ConnectionUsedSSLDeprecatedCipherFallback
histogram.summary: True if an HTTPS connection was made using the deprecated cipher suite fallback.

histogram.name: Net.ConnectionUsedSSLDeprecatedCipherFallback2
histogram.summary: For each successful HTTPS request, whether it used the deprecated cipher suite fallback.

histogram.name: Net.ConnectionUsedSSLv3Fallback
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: True if the HTTP request was to a server which requires SSLv3 fallback

histogram.name: Net.ConnectionUsedSSLVersionFallback
histogram.summary: Nonzero if the HTTP request was to a server which requires SSL version fallback. The value indicates the SSL version the request fell back on.

histogram.name: Net.ConnectionUsedSSLVersionFallback2
histogram.summary: For each successful HTTPS request, whether it used the SSL version fallback. The value indicates the SSL version the request fell back on

histogram.name: Net.ContentDecodingFailed.FilterType
histogram.obsolete: Obsoleted in favor of Net.ContentDecodingFailed2.FilterType below.
histogram.summary: For each CONTENT_DECODING_FAILED, record the filter that failed.

histogram.name: Net.ContentDecodingFailed2.FilterType
histogram.obsolete: Obsoleted in favor of Net.ContentDecodingFailed2 above.
histogram.summary: For each CONTENT_DECODING_FAILED, record the filter that failed.

histogram.name: net.CookieBackingStoreUpdateResults
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Whether or not updates to the backing store succeeded or failed, recorded every update.

histogram.name: net.CookieBetweenAccessIntervalMinutes
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Intervals between access time updates for each cookie.

histogram.name: net.CookieCount
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Number of cookies in the store (recorded every 10 minutes of active browsing time)

histogram.name: net.CookieDeletionCause
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: For each cookie removed from the store, the reason it was removed.

histogram.name: net.CookieDomainCount
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: For each domain, number of cookies in that domain (recorded every 10 minutes of active browsing time).

histogram.name: net.CookieDomainPerEtldp1Count
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: For every top level domain, number of subdomains in that top level domain (recorded every 10 minutes of active browsing time).

histogram.name: net.CookieEtldp1Count
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: For every top level domain, number of cookies in that domain (recorded every 10 minutes of active browsing time).

histogram.name: net.CookieEvictedLastAccessMinutes
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: For each evicted (not expired) cookie, the amount of time since it was last used

histogram.name: net.CookieExpirationDurationMinutes
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Number of minutes until cookie expires when set.

histogram.name: net.CookieTimeGet
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The amount of time (ms) to get cookies for each URL request.

histogram.name: net.CookieTimeLoad
histogram.obsolete: Initial typo; only here to get results from builds before r59117. See "Cookie." group.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The amount of time (ms) to load the persistent cookie store at browser start.

histogram.name: Net.Cors.ActiveLoaderCount
histogram.summary: The distribution of active mojom::URLLoader instance counts including network::URLLoader and network::CorsURLLoader in the network service. This reports every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: Net.Cors.CompletionStatus
histogram.summary: Each CorsURLLoader reports its completion status on finishing each request to analyze how often requests are blocked by CORS checks.

histogram.name: Net.Cors.PreflightCacheEntries
histogram.summary: The distribution of the number of cache entries in the CORS preflight cache. This counts the cache entries every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: Net.Cors.PreflightCacheEntriesPerOrigin
histogram.obsolete: Removed 05/2019, related to cache organization changes that does not store entries per origin any more.
histogram.summary: The distribution of the number of cache entries for each origin in the CORS preflight cache. This counts the cache entries for each origin every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: Net.Cors.PreflightCacheTotalEntries
histogram.summary: The distribution of the total number of cache entries that is sum of all CORS preflight cache entries in the network service. This counts the cache entries every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: Net.Cors.PreflightCacheTotalMemoryPressureInBytes
histogram.summary: The distribution of the total memory presure in bytes for all CORS preflight cache in the network service. This counts the cache entries every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: Net.Cors.PreflightCacheValueSize
histogram.summary: The distribution of estimated memory pressure caused by each cache entry's content in the CORS preflight cache. This counts each entry size when a new entry is added to the cache.

histogram.name: Net.CountOfAlternateProtocolServers
histogram.summary: The total number of servers (HostPortPairs) to which alternative protocol was used. This counts the number of servers persisted to prefs file.

histogram.name: Net.CountOfAlternateProtocolServers.Memory
histogram.summary: The total number of servers (HostPortPairs in memory) to which alternative protocol was used.

histogram.name: Net.CountOfPipelineCapableServers
histogram.obsolete: Removed 05/2014, related field trial already long expired.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The total number of servers (HostPortPairs) that support HTTP pipelining. This counts the number of servers persisted to prefs file.

histogram.name: Net.CountOfSpdyServers
histogram.summary: The total number of SPDY server names persisted to prefs file.

histogram.name: Net.CountOfSpdySettings
histogram.summary: The total number of SPDY Settings properties persisted to prefs file.

histogram.name: Net.CRLRequestFailedTimeMs
histogram.obsolete: Removed 2017-04-21 as it was Linux/CrOS only.
histogram.summary: When validating an HTTPS certificate we may have to block to fetch one or more revocation lists. This measures the amount of time that failures to get CRL information take.

histogram.name: Net.CRLRequestSuccess
histogram.obsolete: Removed 2017-04-21 as it was Linux/CrOS only.
histogram.summary: When validating an HTTPS certificate we may have to block to fetch one or more revocation lists. This records the fraction of successful requests.

histogram.name: Net.CRLRequestTimeMs
histogram.obsolete: Removed 2017-04-21 as it was Linux/CrOS only.
histogram.summary: When validating an HTTPS certificate we may have to block to fetch one or more revocation lists. This measures the amount of time that each fetch takes.

histogram.name: Net.Cronet.CertVerifierCache.DeserializeTime
histogram.summary: Measures time spent to deserialize and populate the net::CachingCertVerifier's cache.

histogram.name: Net.Cronet.CertVerifierCache.SerializeTime
histogram.summary: Measures time spent to serialize the net::CachingCertVerifier's cache.

histogram.name: Net.Cronet.PrefsInitTime
histogram.summary: Measures time spent creating the Cronet PrefService, including loading the prefs from disk synchronously.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentLength
histogram.summary: The total content size in KB of all HTTP/HTTPS response bodies in the previous calendar day. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentLength_DataReductionProxyEnabled
histogram.summary: The total content size in KB of all HTTP/HTTPS response bodies in the previous calendar day while the data reduction proxy setting was enabled. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentLength_DataReductionProxyEnabled_Https
histogram.summary: The total content size in KB of all HTTPS response bodies in the previous calendar day while the data reduction proxy setting was enabled. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentLength_DataReductionProxyEnabled_LongBypass
histogram.summary: The total content size in KB of all long-bypassed HTTP response bodies in the previous calendar day while the data reduction proxy setting was enabled. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentLength_DataReductionProxyEnabled_ShortBypass
histogram.summary: The total content size in KB of all short-bypassed HTTP response bodies in the previous calendar day while the data reduction proxy setting was enabled. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentLength_DataReductionProxyEnabled_Unknown
histogram.summary: The total content size in KB of all HTTP response bodies for requests that were not served by the enabled data reduction proxy for unknown reasons in the previous calendar day while the data reduction proxy setting was enabled. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentLength_DataReductionProxyEnabled_UnknownBypass
histogram.summary: The total content size in KB of all HTTP response bodies for requests that were not served by the enabled data reduction proxy for unknown reasons in the previous calendar day while the data reduction proxy setting was enabled. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentLength_ViaDataReductionProxy
histogram.summary: The total content size in KB of all HTTP/HTTPS response bodies in the previous calendar day via the data reduction proxy. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentPercent_DataReductionProxyEnabled
histogram.summary: The percentage of total HTTP/HTTPS response body size while the data reduction proxy is enabled to total HTTP/HTTPS response body size in the previous calendar day. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentPercent_DataReductionProxyEnabled_Https
histogram.summary: The percentage of total HTTPS response body size while the data reduction proxy is enabled to total HTTP/HTTPS response body size in the previous calendar day. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentPercent_DataReductionProxyEnabled_LongBypass
histogram.summary: The percentage of total long-bypassed response body size while the data reduction proxy is enabled to total HTTP/HTTPS response body size in the previous calendar day. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentPercent_DataReductionProxyEnabled_ShortBypass
histogram.summary: The percentage of total short-bypassed response body size while the data reduction proxy is enabled to total HTTP/HTTPS response body size in the previous calendar day. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentPercent_DataReductionProxyEnabled_Unknown
histogram.summary: The percentage of total body size of responses that were not served by the data reduction proxy for unknown reason while the data reduction proxy is enabled to total HTTP/HTTPS response body size in the previous calendar day. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentPercent_ViaDataReductionProxy
histogram.summary: The percentage of total HTTP/HTTPS response body size via the data reduction proxy to total HTTP/HTTPS response body size in the previous calendar day. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentSavingPercent
histogram.summary: The percentage of data saving in the previous calendar day. A negative saving will be shown as zero. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentSavingPercent_DataReductionProxyEnabled
histogram.summary: The percentage of data saving in the previous calendar day while the data reduction proxy was enabled. A negative saving will be shown as zero. This only counts responses while the data reduction proxy is enabled. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentSavingPercent_DataReductionProxyEnabled_Video
histogram.summary: The percentage of data saving in the previous calendar day while the data reduction proxy was enabled. A negative saving will be shown as zero. This only counts responses while the data reduction proxy is enabled. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received. If no video bytes were received while the data reduction proxy was enabled, the metric will not be reported.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentSavingPercent_ViaDataReductionProxy
histogram.summary: The percentage of data saving in the previous calendar day via the data reduction proxy. A negative saving will be shown as zero. This only counts responses via the data reduction proxy. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyContentSavingPercent_ViaDataReductionProxy_Video
histogram.summary: The percentage of data saving in the previous calendar day via the data reduction proxy. A negative saving will be shown as zero. This only counts responses via the data reduction proxy. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received. If no video bytes were received via the data reduction proxy, the metric will not be reported.

histogram.name: Net.DailyHttpContentLengthViaDataReductionProxy
histogram.summary: Total size in KB of all response bodies in the previous calendar day that were received through the data reduction proxy.

histogram.name: Net.DailyHttpContentLengthWithDataReductionProxyEnabled
histogram.summary: Total size in KB of all response bodies in the previous calendar day that were received when the data reduction proxy was enabled.

histogram.name: Net.DailyHttpContentSavings
histogram.summary: The percentage of data saving in the previous calendar day. A negative saving will be shown as zero.

histogram.name: Net.DailyHttpContentSavings_DataReductionProxy
histogram.summary: The percentage of data saving in the previous calendar day when the data reduction proxy was enabled for at least some responses during the day. A negative saving will be shown as zero.

histogram.name: Net.DailyHttpOriginalContentLength
histogram.summary: Total size in KB specified in the X-Original-Content-Length headers of all responses in the previous calendar day. If the header is not present in a response, the size of the response body is used.

histogram.name: Net.DailyHttpReceivedContentLength
histogram.summary: Total size in KB of all response bodies in the previous calendar day.

histogram.name: Net.DailyOriginalContentLength
histogram.summary: The total size in KB specified in the X-Original-Content-Length headers of all HTTP/HTTPS response bodies in the previous calendar day. If the header is not present in a response, the size of the response body is used. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyOriginalContentLength_DataReductionProxyEnabled
histogram.summary: The total size in KB specified in the X-Original-Content-Length headers of all HTTP/HTTPS response bodies in the previous calendar day while the data reduction proxy is enabled. If the header is not present in a response, the size of the response body is used. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyOriginalContentLength_ViaDataReductionProxy
histogram.summary: The total size in KB specified in the X-Original-Content-Length headers of all HTTP/HTTPS response bodies in the previous calendar day via the data reduction proxy. If the header is not present in a response, the size of the response body is used. The metric is reported when the first response in the current day is received.

histogram.name: Net.DailyReceivedContentViaDataReductionProxy
histogram.summary: The percentage of Net.DailyHttpContentLengthViaDataReductionProxy in Net.DailyHttpReceivedContentLength.

histogram.name: Net.DailyReceivedContentWithDataReductionProxyEnabled
histogram.summary: The percentage of Net.DailyHttpContentLengthWithDataReductionProxyEnabled in Net.DailyHttpReceivedContentLength.

histogram.name: Net.DailyUserVisibleSavingsPercent_DataReductionProxyEnabled
histogram.summary: The percentage of data savings in past |DataReductionProxy::kNumDaysInHistorySummary| days. This number is displayed to users as their data savings.

histogram.name: Net.DailyUserVisibleSavingsSize_DataReductionProxyEnabled
histogram.summary: The total data saved in KB in past |DataReductionProxy::kNumDaysInHistorySummary| days. This number is used to compute the data savings displayed to the user.

histogram.name: Net.DetachableResourceHandler.Duration
histogram.summary: Duration of time that a request associated with DetachableResourceHandler takes.

histogram.name: Net.DhcpWpadCancelTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Measures time from initiating a fetch of a PAC file from DHCP WPAD to cancellation of the fetch. For a given fetch, only one of the cancellation or completion histograms will be added to.

histogram.name: Net.DhcpWpadCompletionTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Measures time from initiating a fetch of a PAC file from DHCP WPAD to completion of the fetch. For a given fetch, only one of the cancellation or completion histograms will be added to.

histogram.name: Net.DhcpWpadFetchError
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Tracks the net error codes received when the DHCP WPAD fetch fails to retrieve a PAC file (including PAC_NOT_IN_DHCP, which is not really an error but an indication that a PAC URL was not configured in DHCP).

histogram.name: Net.DhcpWpadGetAdaptersAddressesError
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Tracks the frequency of each of the different known error codes of calling the GetAdaptersAddresses Win32 API.

histogram.name: Net.DhcpWpadGetAdaptersAddressesTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Measures the time taken to call the GetAdaptersAddresses Win32 API, to validate our understanding that it should complete quickly enough to call synchronously from the network thread.

histogram.name: Net.DhcpWpadNumAdaptersAtWaitTimer
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Total number of adapters enabled for DHCP as seen when the wait timer in the DHCP WPAD code hits. This timer fires after a timeout from when we get some information from the first adapter to finish.

histogram.name: Net.DhcpWpadNumPendingAdaptersAtWaitTimer
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Number of adapters enabled for DHCP that we have not completed retrieving information for, as seen when the wait timer in the DHCP WPAD code hits. This timer fires after a timeout from when we get some information from the first adapter to finish.

histogram.name: Net.DhcpWpadUnhandledDhcpError
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Counts the number of errors from the DhcpRequestParams API that we do not have specific handling for, so that we can see if there is an abnormally high rate.

histogram.name: Net.DiskCache.Size
histogram.summary:
The sum of the size of all files in the HTTP cache directory.
This is recorded on startup, and then every 24 hours afterwards. However, it is only recorded for 0.1% of profiles, to reduce overhead for most users. This is meant to be a temporary metric to help debug a potential HTTP cache leak. We do not yet know which milestone we expect it to be removed in.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.Android.AutoDohPrivate
histogram.summary: For devices using Android private DNS, are their DNS servers known to support DNS-over-HTTPS.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.Android.AutoDohPublic
histogram.summary: For devices not using Android private DNS, are their DNS servers known to support DNS-over-HTTPS, thus potential candidates for automatic upgrading from regular DNS to DNS-over-HTTPS.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.Android.DotExplicit
histogram.summary: For devices using Android private DNS, was their DNS-over-TLS server specified explicitly in their Android settings. When false, they were automatically upgraded from the standard DNS protocol to DNS-over-TLS via auto-detection.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.DnsTask.FailureTime
histogram.summary: Duration of time taken by DnsTask in resolutions that failed. Excludes time spent in the subsequent fallback.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.DnsTransaction.EsniTask.EsniTransactionEndToEndElapsed
histogram.obsolete: As of 02/2020, no longer necessary because the ESNI record fetching implementation has been superseded by the new HTTPSSVC DNS record type.
histogram.summary: Total time elapsed from the beginning of ESNI-type DnsTasks to the completion of ESNI-type DnsTransactions executed during these tasks. Recorded only for DnsTasks specifically with DnsQueryType::ESNI, i.e. *not* for those made during the normal built-in resolver flow.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.DnsTransaction.EsniUnspecTask.EsniMinusNonEsni
histogram.obsolete: As of 02/2020, no longer necessary because the ESNI record fetching implementation has been superseded by the new HTTPSSVC DNS record type.
histogram.summary: For an UNSPECIFIED-type DnsTask, the total end-to-end elapsed time from the beginning of the task to the completion of its final ESNI-type DnsTransaction, minus the total end-to-end elapsed time to the completion of the task's final non-ESNI-type transaction. Recorded only when the built-in resolver is configured to make ESNI queries alongside A and AAAA queries, and only when the task's ESNI transaction finishes after its final non-ESNI transaction.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.DnsTransaction.EsniUnspecTask.EsniTransactionEndToEndElapsed
histogram.obsolete: As of 02/2020, no longer necessary because the ESNI record fetching implementation has been superseded by the new HTTPSSVC DNS record type.
histogram.summary: Total time elapsed from the beginning of a DnsTask to the completion of an ESNI transaction. Recorded only when the built-in resolver is configured to make ESNI queries alongside A and AAAA queries.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.DnsTransaction.EsniUnspecTask.NonEsniEndToEndElapsed
histogram.obsolete: As of 02/2020, no longer necessary because the ESNI record fetching implementation has been superseded by the new HTTPSSVC DNS record type.
histogram.summary: Total time elapsed from the beginning of an UNSPECIFIED-type DnsTask to the completion of its final non-ESNI-type DnsTransaction. Recorded only when the built-in resolver is configured to make ESNI queries alongside A and AAAA queries.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.DnsTransaction.EsniUnspecTask.NonEsniMinusEsni
histogram.obsolete: As of 02/2020, no longer necessary because the ESNI record fetching implementation has been superseded by the new HTTPSSVC DNS record type.
histogram.summary: For an UNSPECIFIED-type DnsTask, the total end-to-end elapsed time from the beginning of the task to the completion of its final non-ESNI-type DnsTransaction, minus the total end-to-end elapsed time to the completion of the task's final ESNI-type transaction. Recorded only when the built-in resolver is configured to make ESNI queries alongside A and AAAA queries, and only when the task's final non-ESNI transaction finishes no earlier than its ESNI transaction.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.DnsTransaction.EsniUnspecTask.SuccessOrTimeout
histogram.obsolete: As of 02/2020, no longer necessary because the ESNI record fetching implementation has been superseded by the new HTTPSSVC DNS record type.
histogram.summary: Records successful completions and DnsTask-level timeout cancellations of ESNI (TLS 1.3 Encrypted Server Name Indication, Draft 4)-type DNS transactions. Recorded only when the built-in resolver is configured to make ESNI queries alongside A and AAAA queries.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.JobQueueTime
histogram.summary: Time elapsed between the time the HostResolverImpl::Job was created and the time the Job was started.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.JobQueueTimeAfterChange
histogram.summary: Time elapsed between the last time the priority of a HostResolverImpl::Job changed (when a Request was attached or detached) and the time the Job was started.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.RecordParser.DomainNameLength
histogram.summary: Length of domain name parsed by DnsRecordParser::ReadName().

histogram.name: Net.DNS.ResultAfterMalformedResponse
histogram.summary: When DnsUDPAttempt gets a malformed response, it returns an error but continues running. This histogram records all attempt outcomes that are returned to the transaction once a malformed response has been received, including the original malformed response.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.SecureDnsMode.Automatic.TotalTime
histogram.summary: Duration of time since a HostResolverImpl::Resolve request to the time a result is posted for requests issued in AUTOMATIC mode. Excludes cancled, evicted, and aborted requests. Includes cache hits (recorded as 0). Excludes speculative requests.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.SecureDnsMode.Off.TotalTime
histogram.summary: Duration of time since a HostResolverImpl::Resolve request to the time a result is posted for requests issued in OFF mode. Excludes cancled, evicted, and aborted requests. Includes cache hits (recorded as 0). Excludes speculative requests.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.SecureDnsMode.Secure.TotalTime
histogram.summary: Duration of time since a HostResolverImpl::Resolve request to the time a result is posted for requests issued in SECURE mode. Excludes cancled, evicted, and aborted requests. Includes cache hits (recorded as 0). Excludes speculative requests.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.TotalTime
histogram.summary: Duration of time since a HostResolverImpl::Resolve request to the time a result is posted. Excludes canceled, evicted, and aborted requests. Includes cache hits (recorded as 0). Excludes speculative requests.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.TotalTimeNotCached
histogram.summary: Duration of time since a HostResolverImpl::Resolve request to the time a result is posted. Excludes canceled, evicted, and aborted requests and requests that returned synchronously (such as cache hits). Excludes speculative requests.

histogram.name: Net.DNS.TotalTimeTyped
histogram.summary: Duration of time since a HostResolverImpl::Resolve request to the time a result is posted. Excludes canceled, evicted, and aborted requests. Includes cache hits (recorded as 0). Excludes speculative requests.

histogram.name: Net.DNS_Resolution_And_TCP_Connection_Latency
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.

histogram.name: Net.Dns_Resolution_And_TCP_Connection_Latency
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.

histogram.name: Net.Dns_Resolution_And_TCP_Connection_Latency2
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.

histogram.name: Net.DNSNameCompliantIfValid
histogram.obsolete: Removed 07/2017, not necessary to determine deprecation for invalid DNS names.
histogram.summary: True if |net::IsCanonicalizedHostCompliant| returns true. Used to see if IsCanonicalizedHostCompliant() runs afoul of real websites. This histogram is recorded when converting dotted DNS names into DNS query form, in preparation for issuing a DNS request. This histogram is only recorded if Net.ValidDNSName is true.

histogram.name: Net.DoubleGetExperiment_InitialResponseMethod
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of HTTP request responses with MS Office Docs MIME types. The responses are classified based on their method type and cacheability (POST, cacheable GET and non-cacheable GET). The histogram is used in Double GET Experiment, where successful non-cacheable GET requests are intercepted after initial response and repeated in order to determine how much reissuing non-cacheable GET requests influences their error rate. The histogram tracks only initial requests (not the repeated ones).

histogram.name: Net.DoubleGetExperiment_ResponseCode
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The response codes encountered for GET request repeated in Double GET Experiment. In the experiment successful non-cacheable GET requests are intercepted after initial response and repeated. The goal of the experiment is to measure how much reissuing non-cacheable GET requests influences their error rate.

histogram.name: Net.DownloadBandwidth
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 03/2015. No longer generated.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Kbps on download streams exceeding 25KB. Measures from the beginning of the first byte received until the end of flowing data.

histogram.name: Net.ErrAborted.CountPerUpload
histogram.obsolete: Removed in favor of Net.ErrAborted.CountPerUpload2 which has a higher upper bound
histogram.summary: The count of the ABORTED bucket in Net.ErrorCodesForMainFrame3 at the time histograms are being uploaded.

histogram.name: Net.ErrAborted.ReceivedBytes
histogram.summary: The TotalReceivedBytes() at the time the request finishes with ERR_ABORTED.

histogram.name: Net.ErrAborted.SentBytes
histogram.summary: The TotalSentBytes() at the time the request finishes with ERR_ABORTED.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorCodesForHTTPSGoogleMainFrame
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 2012/5/16, replaced by Net.ErrorCodesForHTTPSGoogleMainFrame2, which measures the same data but includes ERR_ABORT and OK.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Errors resulting from loading pages from https://www.google.com. Note that this only counts the errors in "main frames", so it is a measure of the error pages that users actually see (it does not for example count the error codes for subresoures on a page). This is a temporary histogram, added in order to debug query loss from the SSL Search launch.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorCodesForHTTPSGoogleMainFrame2
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 7/2018, replaced by Net.ErrorCodesForHTTPSGoogleMainFrame3.
histogram.summary: Positive net error codes that requests for pages end with, including net::OK and net::ERR_ABORTED. This only counts loads in "main frames" for https://www.google.com. Subresources or main frame navigations to other origins are not included.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorCodesForImages
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 7/2018, replaced by Net.ErrorCodesForImages2, which is recorded in a net-service friendly way.
histogram.summary: Net error codes that requests for images end with, including net::OK and net:ERR_ABORTED.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorCodesForMainFrame
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 2011/5/24, replaced by Net.ErrorCodesForMainFrame2, which measures the same data but uses a different bucket structure (adds guard buckets).
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Positive net error code that a page failed with. Note that this only counts the errors in "main frames", so it is a measure of the error pages that users actually see (it does not for example count the error codes for subresoures on a page).

histogram.name: Net.ErrorCodesForMainFrame2
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 2012/5/16, replaced by Net.ErrorCodesForMainFrame3, which measures the same data but includes ERR_ABORTED and OK.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Positive net error code that a page failed with. Note that this only counts the errors in "main frames", so it is a measure of the error pages that users actually see (it does not for example count the error codes for subresoures on a page).

histogram.name: Net.ErrorCodesForMainFrame3
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 7/2018, replaced by Net.ErrorCodesForMainFrame4, which is recorded in a net-service friendly way.
histogram.summary: Positive net error codes that requests for pages end with, including net::OK and net::ERR_ABORTED. This only counts loads in "main frames" (it does not for example count the error codes for subresoures on a page).

histogram.name: Net.ErrorCodesForSubresources
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 2012/5/16, replaced by Net.ErrorCodesForSubresources2, which measures the same data but includes ERR_ABORT and OK.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Positive net error code that a page failed with. Note that this only counts the errors in "subresources".

histogram.name: Net.ErrorCodesForSubresources2
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 7/2018, replaced by Net.ErrorCodesForSubresources3, which is recorded in a net-service friendly way.
histogram.summary: Net error codes that requests for "subresources" end with, including net::OK and net::ERR_ABORTED.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorCodesForTLS13ExperimentMainFrame
histogram.obsolete: Removed as of 7/2018, replaced by Net.ErrorCodesForTLS13ExperimentMainFrame2, which is recorded in a net-service friendly way.
histogram.summary: Positive net error codes that requests for pages end with, including net::OK and net::ERR_ABORTED. This only counts loads in "main frames" for endpoints used in the initial TLS 1.3 deployment. Subresources or main frame navigations to other origins are not included.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorPageButtonPressedWhileInUnexpectedState
histogram.summary: Temporary histogram to investigate http://crbug.com/500556. Records which button on the network error page was pushed when either the URL Blink reports for the page is not the internal error page URL or the NetErrorHelper core has no error information for the current page (or both).

histogram.name: Net.ErrorPageButtonPressUnexpectedStates
histogram.summary: Temporary histogram to investigate http://crbug.com/500556. Records whether, when the handler for a button press on the network error page runs, which of the following are or are not true: The URL Blink reports for the page is not the internal error page URL or the NetErrorHelper core has no error information for the current page.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorPageCounts.NavigationCorrectionLinksShown
histogram.summary: Counts of the type of navigation correction suggestions shown on the network error page. Multiple suggestions can be shown at the same time.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorPageCounts.NavigationCorrectionLinksUsed
histogram.summary: Usage of navigation correction suggestions shown on the network error page.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorResponseHasContentMainFrame
histogram.summary: The number of main frame 4xx/5xx responses that have content, to determine if it's worth hooking up an error page for those that don't. Intended to be removed from the binary soon.

histogram.name: Net.ErrorResponseHasContentNonMainFrame
histogram.summary: The number of non-main frame 4xx/5xx responses that have content, to determine if it's worth hooking up an error page for those that don't. Intended to be removed from the binary soon.

histogram.name: Net.ExpectCTHeaderResult
histogram.summary: Sites can send an Expect-CT header to Chrome to indicate that they want a report to be sent when the connection does not comply with Certificate Transparency policy. This histogram is recorded whenever Chrome receives an Expect-CT header, and it records the result of processing the header, such as whether it was ignored due to a bad value.

histogram.name: Net.FileError_Flush
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code that a file Flush failed with. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileError_GetSize
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code that a file GetSize failed with. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileError_Open

histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code that a file Open failed with. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileError_Read

histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code that a file Read failed with. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileError_Write

histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code that a file Write failed with. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileErrorRange_Flush
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code range that a file Flush failed with. Any value other than 0 indicates that we have received errors in a range outside of the one in which we recorded the specific errors in Net.FileError_Flush. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileErrorRange_GetSize
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code range that a file GetSize failed with. Any value other than 0 indicates that we have received errors in a range outside of the one in which we recorded the specific errors in Net.FileError_GetSize. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileErrorRange_Open
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code range that a file Open failed with. Any value other than 0 indicates that we have received errors in a range outside of the one in which we recorded the specific errors in Net.FileError_Open. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileErrorRange_Read
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code range that a file Read failed with. Any value other than 0 indicates that we have received errors in a range outside of the one in which we recorded the specific errors in Net.FileError_Read. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileErrorRange_Seek
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code range that a file Seek failed with. Any value other than 0 indicates that we have received errors in a range outside of the one in which we recorded the specific errors in Net.FileError_Seek. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileErrorRange_SetEof
histogram.obsolete: Removed 04/2016 as doesn't have data nor owner.
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: System error code range that a file SetEof failed with. Any value other than 0 indicates that we have received errors in a range outside of the one in which we recorded the specific errors in Net.FileError_SetEof. The code is OS dependent, so when looking at the histogram don't mix OSes.

histogram.name: Net.FileErrorRange_Write
